      • registerNew

        public EnrollmentDto registerNew(EnrollmentDto dto)
                          throws BusinessException
        Description copied from interface: CourseAttendanceService
        Registers the attendance of a mechanic to a course.
        Specified by:
        registerNew in interface CourseAttendanceService
        Returns:
        the same dto but with the id field set to the generated UUID value
        Throws:
        BusinessException - if: - the mechanic id does not exit, or - the course id does not exist, or - there already is another enrollment registered for the same mechanic and course, or - the attendance is under 85% and the course is marked as passed, or - the course is not yet finished, or <- IGNORE THIS, complicates testing - the value for percentage is not in the range 0..100
